---
title: "Chipotle roasted sweetcorn with squash, black beans, feta & lime"
author: "[Rukmini Iyer
](https://g.co/kgs/HFDagrP)"
categories: [mexican]
description: "Works well with corn on the cob, or frozen sweetcorn"
---

- 750g squash, in 1cm slices
- 4 cobs of sweetcorn 
- 1 tin of black beans
- 1 tsp chipotle chilli flakes
- 1 tsp coriander
- 1 tsp cumin
- 1 tsp salt
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 1 lime (juice only)
- 200g feta
- fresh coriander

1. Preheat oven to 180C fan
1. Mix squash, sweetcorn and beans with the spices, salt & oil
1. Roast for 45 min
1. Top with lime juice, feta and coriander, serve with rice & sour cream.
